title: the new client is so bad
body:
is riot aware how many bugs the new client has
on a daily basis i probably come across at least 3
and oh boy let me introduce you to how long it takes to do runes
it can take at least 2 minutes to just do runes
low spec mode is useless, and at some points my region is switched to na (usually happens each week) and sometimes i even have to download 3gbs of patching when i switch back to oce.
